document.full_text: a senate committee will step up oversight of the government's unpopular tarp bank bailout program now it is losing one of its watchdogs, a top senator said on thursday.
document.title: senate panel to step up tarp oversight: chairman
lines_and_colors: a senate committee will step up oversight of the government's unpopular tarp bank bailout program now it is losing one of its watchdogs, a top senator said on thursday.
